subject: Canadian Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk, a two-time winner at the Canadian Open, birdied two of his final four holes Friday for a seven-under-par 63 and a share of the tournament lead with Tim Petrovic.
snippet: Jim Furyk, a two-time winner at the Canadian Open, birdied two of his final four holes Friday for a seven-under-par 63 and a share of the tournament lead with Tim Petrovic.
